BMI.name: BMI Calculator
BMI.description: This calculator will help you calculate your Body Mass Index

BMRM.name: Basal Metabolic Rate for Men
BMRM.description: This calculator returns an estimate of the basal metabolic rate for a man

BMRW.name: Basal Metabolic Rate for Women
BMRW.description: This calculator returns an estimate of the basal metalbolic rate for a woman

HYPOT.name: Hypotenuse Calculator
HYPOT.description: Want to get there faster? Try out this hypotenuse calculator!

SPHERE.name: Sphere Surface Area Calculator
SPHERE.description: Calculates the surface area of a sphere. Input radius = 69911000 to estimate the surface area (in meters) of Jupiter!

BUOY.name: Buoyancy Calculator
BUOY.description: Calculates the buoyancy force on a submerged object.

BOOK.name: Just How Big is That Book?
BOOK.description: This calculator tells you the total surface area of a book. Useless? Yes. Interesting? Mildly so.

LIB.name: People in the Valley Library
LIB.description: Need to know if there will be seats available at the Valley Library?

CIRC.name: Number of transistors in a circuit
CIRC.description: This calculator will tell you the number of CMOS transistors in a circuit based on the type and number of gates.

FLIGHT.name: Miles in A Flight
FLIGHT.description: The calculator will find the number of miles for a flight to and back from your destination.
